column5: Reaction: After this unit is declared as an attacker, remove 1 damage from a target support card.
Reaction: After a Space Marines unit you control is damaged by an attack, exhaust that unit to deal damage equal to twice the unit's printed attack to the attacker.
Combat Action: Exhaust this support to deploy a Space Marines unit with a printed cost of exactly 3 from your hand at a planet.
Interrupt: When you deploy a support card, reduce its cost by 1.
Reaction: After this unit enters play, it gains +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the phase.

Deep Strike (2).
Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, Deep Strike a Dark Angels unit you control in reserve at the same planet.
Bloodthirst - During a combat round in which 1 or more units have been destroyed at this planet, this unit gains Retaliate (3).
Forced Reaction: After a token unit at this planet resolves an attack, destroy that unit.

No Attachments.
Reaction: After this unit deals damage by an attack, remove 1 damage from it.

No Wargear Attachments.
While this unit has faith it gets +3 ATK.
Reaction: After a Space Marines unit you control at this planet is destroyed, gain 1 resource. (Limit once per phase)
Reaction: After an attack by this unit against an army unit doesn't destroy the defender, ready a target Space Marines unit you control. (Limit once per phase)
Reaction: After an enemy army unit with 2 or more printed command icons enters play at this planet, deal 1 damage to that unit.

This support can be used as a shield card while it is in play. It has shield icons equal to 2 + the number of tokens on it.
Reaction: After your opponent places a planet in their victory display, place 1 resource on this support.

Attach to a Soldier army unit. Limit 1 per unit.
While attached unit is ready, each enemy army and token unit at this planet has -1 ATK.
column14: Removed Space Wolves requirement, more interesting to see if how well it works out of faction.

column5:
No Wargear Attachments. Flying.
Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack against a warlord unit, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the game.
